name: Remember the Milk - Uber-Focus Mode
description:
This style removes much of the other functions/chrome around your task list so you can focus on just a couple of items at a time.
It should look like this: http://screencast.com/t/vNFMra56N8w

You must replace the YOURUSERNAMEHERE with your username.
additional_info: You can't exactly "remove" floats, but you can unclear them.  I wish I could get the details at the bottom and the tasks to have no floats, but that's is not the same as defining a float and then clearing it.
